benchmark_details.name: Prompt2Fashion: An automatically generated fashion dataset
benchmark_details.overview: We created a dataset of fashion images by leveraging generative models to automatically construct a fashion image dataset tailored to various occasions, styles, and body types as instructed by users.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a diverse collection of AI-generated fashion content tailored to various occasions, styles, and body types.

data.source: Generated by Large Language Models and a Diffusion Model.

methodology.calculation: Mean ratings provided by human evaluators regarding the alignment of outfits with intended designs.
methodology.interpretation: A higher mean rating indicates a stronger alignment with the intended design for style and suitability.
methodology.validation: The dataset validation reflects qualitative analysis and human annotations.
